content: 2 for all the love and people you put in knit work body of hat and add in color 2 switch to larger needle round 1 color b k1 p1b repeat to end of round round 2 color a k1b p1 repeat to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 13 more times 26 rounds switching colors every round continue body with color b only cut color a leaving a 10 tail with color b only repeat rounds 1 and 2 above 8 more times 16 rounds begin decreases for top of hat note switch to double-pointed needles or magic loop as necessary decrease round 1 *k1 slip next 2 sts together knitwise p1b psso k1 p1b 4 times pm -- repeat from * to end of round 40 sts round 2 *k1b k1 k1b p1 4 times sm - repeat from * to end of round decrease round 3 *k1 k1b k1 wyib slip next 2 sts together knitwise p1b psso k1 p1b 2 times sm -- repeat from * to end of round 32 sts round 4 * k1b k1 2 times k1b p1 2 times sm -- repeat from * to end of round decrease round 5 *wyib slip next 2 sts together knitwise k1 psso k1b k1 wyib slip next 2 sts together knitwise p1b psso sm -- repeat from * to end of round 16 sts round 6 *k1 wyib slip next 2 sts together knitwise k1 psso sm - repeat from * to end of round 8sts finishing cut yarn leaving a 10 tail thread a blunt-tip needle with the tail and gather up the remaining 8 stitches to secure the top of the hat stabilize brim if desired optional work a round of crochet slip stitches around the bottom of the brim to stabilize the beanie and keep it from stretching too much weave in all ends and sew on the base portion of the pompom snap snap on pompom 3 for all the love and people you put in knit we hope you ve enjoyed knitting this pattern for more patterns by jan rosé please visit www in- knit com you can find jan on instagram as inknit_jan on facebook as @inknit and on ravelry as inknit-jan 4
